title: abhishek bachchan: This candid picture of Amitabh and Abhishek Bachchan will melt your heart | Hindi Movie News - Times of India
text:
The Bachchans have always been a close-knit family, with Abhishek Bachchan always mentioning how he shares a deep bond with his 'Pa' Amitabh Bachchan and mother Jaya. 

Amitabh Bachchan completes 48 glorious years in Bollywood, shares his excitement on Twitter The legendary actor, Amitabh Bachchan completed 48 years in Bollywood on February 15. 
The 'Housefull 3' actor took to Instagram to post a candid picture of him hugging his father. Big B has a look of surprise on his face while the 'Guru' actor clings to him endearingly. But what is even more heartwarming is the caption from Junior Bachchan which read," Never, never, never leave an opportunity to hug your parents.... Even if it takes them by surprise! #fathersandsons". Looks like Abhishek has set an example for everyone on how to keep family ties strong. 

On the professional front, he will be next seen in Prabhudheva 's 'Lefty' where as Big B has a slew of projects lined up including 'Sarkar 3' and Aamir Khan 's 'Thugs of Hindostan'.
